original_title: 大切な彼女がクラスのDQN達に媚薬を使って犯されキメセク堕ちしているのを見てクズ勃起
overview: I Was Excited To See My Childhood Friend Nana, Who I've Always Liked, Get Fucked In Front Of The DQNs In Our Class With Aphrodisiac Oil And Fucked. Even though it should be important... even though I should have liked it. I Couldn't Help Seeing Nana Being Fucked As A Sex Slave, So I Asked The DQNs To Make Nana Soaked In An Aphrodisiac. With this, you can see Nana going crazy with yoga. What I liked more than Nana as a girlfriend was the sex slave Nana who fell into sex.
title: Seeing My Precious Girlfriend Being Enjoyed By The DQNs In Class Using an Aphrodisiac And Made To Have Sex With You Gives Me A Poor Erection Nana Yagi
